specific_instructions_to_main_agent: IMPORT 'Mukta' font from Google Fonts in index.css (weights 400, 500, 700, 800).
Ensure all text is in MARATHI. Use Google Translate if needed but stick to formal terms (e.g., 'Mukhya Prishtha' for Home, 'Sampark' for Contact).
Admin Dashboard must be role-based. Super Admin can do everything. Editor cannot manage Users/Settings.
Use 'recharts' for Visitor Analytics in Admin Dashboard.
Use 'jspdf' for generating PDF certificates or receipts if required.
Ensure the Visitor Counter is stored in the backend (simple increment).
Use 'lucide-react' icons: 'Landmark' for Panchayat, 'Users' for Members, 'FileText' for Notices, 'Phone' for Contact.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle patterns.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-700 or slate-900 on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-orange-500).
accessibility.aria: Add aria-labels to all icon-only buttons.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids and asymmetry where appropriate.
Create depth through layered design elements (borders, shadows).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable (p-8 instead of p-4).
